page.title: 14Sport in Tadcaster
page.content: There is quite a variety of forms of{ {recreation}available in the Tadcaster area, but the main ones are to be found at the Tadcaster Sports and Leisure Centre. Here a number of different{sports}are to be found including indoor soccer, volleyball, basketball, indoor tennis, netball and badminton. In addition there are{ {Martial Arts}such as judo and karate and also aerobics. The Centre has changing rooms, toilets and showers. Rollerskating is also available for all the family including the hire of rollerboots and training by a professional coach. Upstairs is a cafeteria and viewing area with{video {games}and pool tables.
